verses.roman:
bhakta-gaṇa prabhu-saṅge rahe cāri-māse
prabhu ājñā dilā sabe gelā gauḍa-deśe

synonyms: bhakta-gaṇa—all the devotees; prabhu-saṅge—with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; rahe—remained; cāri-māse—for four months; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ājñā dilā—gave the order; sabe—unto everyone; gelā—returned; gauḍa-deśe—to Bengal.
translation: All the devotees remained with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu continuously for four months. Then the Lord ordered them back to Bengal, and therefore they returned.
